code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={value:false};export var burgerSlice=createSlice({name:'burger',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setBurgerValue:function setBurgerValue(state){state.value=!state.value;}}});var setBurgerValue=burgerSlice.actions.setBurgerValue;export{setBurgerValue};export var selectBurgerValue=function selectBurgerValue(state){return state.burger.value;};export default burgerSlice.reducer;
